name: Slices Go - Roller Knife
description:
Slice Go challenge is here!

Throwing knives into the logs to break them.
Slash the coins and unlock new knives. Each 4th stage is defended by a boss - beat them to bypass level!

Be careful to not hit the knives. It is stop game right now. Time your actions, target carefully and become the knife master!

Can you beat all the bosses and get all knife? Good Luck
